name: Telesto
flavor_text: Vestiges of the Queen's Harbingers yet linger among Saturn's moons.

frame.name: Unplanned Reprieve
frame.description: Fusion projectiles attach and detonate with a delayed Void blast.

perks.description: Multikills with this weapon immediately reload your equipped Kinetic and Energy weapons from reserves.
perks.name: Harbinger's Pulse

perks.description:
This weapon's grip is made of lighter material.
  •  Increases handling speed
perks.name: Polymer Grip
